title: Sub-Prime
description: Two powerless beings are swept together in a transient struggle for survival. Could the human spirit transcend the brutality and indifference of their brief experience before they are once again swept helplessly apart?Far more than a love story - this is a story about love.Part of Emma Calin's 'Love in a Hopeless Place Collection' - a series of stand alone titles. Available as an individual e-book or as a part of the 'boxed-set'. These titles are linked by a common theme exploring relationships, love and survival within a contemporary working class background.
author: Emma Calin
